businesses.name: DroneSec
businesses.business_details: A natural evolution from cyber-security (Penetration Testing and Red Teaming), DroneSec combines years of technical know-how with deep roots in both commercial and hobbyist drones. Part of the Privasec family, DroneSec has a large arm of expert consultants in multiple industries and skill specialisations - all committed to ensuring optimal physical, digital, and airspace security to drones. You might say that drone security is our obsession, which we utilise to your advantage.
businesses.product_details:
DroneSec specialises in security within the drone ecosystem. We cover all aspects of security in drones, Counter-Drone systems, and Universal Traffic Management (UTM) systems. DroneSec offers consulting advice on drone security defence, as well as help organisations innovate and manage risk in relation to drones.

Our team of hackers and drone experts focus on In-House and Commercial-Off-The-Shelf (COTS) drones and some of the drone security programmes we provide include:

- Penetration Testing & Hardening
- Forensics & Incident Response
- Red Teaming & Aerial Threat Simulations
- Customised Training Programs
- Drone and Counter-Drone Threat Intelligence Platform
businesses.new_products: Our training courses cover the entire drone ecosystem. Fundamental drone security concepts, counter-drone essentials and actionable playbooks based on threat-intelligence, and DroneSec case studies are included with the same training we use to train our drone security consultants.
businesses.headline: We are your drone security partners
